response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you have the opportunity to experience its exceptional benefits without compromising on quality. I trust that this investment will bring significant returns and meet your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
